data.text: Taami xuntunyi sɔtɔfe bɔɲɛsa kui
Walikɛ xaxilima sɛnbɛ gbo dangife wali kanyi xa di ra,
Xɛɛma nun gbeti matose na tɛ nan na,
Fe kobi raba wɔyɛn tinxintare ramɛma,
Mixi naxan yoma setaree ma,
Mamadie findixi forie xa sɛɛwɛ nan na,
Mangɛ xa wɔyɛnyi mu lan xaxilitare dɛ i,
Ki tife naadɛe rabima nɛ, a fe birin sɔɔnɛyama nɛ.
Diɲɛfe konbi ma a marafanyi nan na gboma,
Tantanyi masenfe lɔnnila bɛ a fahaamui fima nɛ a ma,
Mixi ɲaaxi naxan mangɛ matandima tun,
Naralanfe sube xaaɲɛ ra, naxan xa die baxi a yi,
Mixi naxan fe fanyi ɲɔxɔma fe ɲaaxi ra,
Gere fɔlɔfe luxi nɛ alɔ bogoni ibɔɔfe.
Mixi naxan nɔndi fima fe kobi rabama,
Hali kɔbiri lu lɔnnitare yi ra,
Mixi a dɛfanboore xanuma tɛmui birin,
Lɔnnitare naxan xaxili mu na,
Gere rafan mixi yo ma,
Mixi yo madaxui tima, na mu hɛɛri sɔtɔma,
Mixi yo di lɔnnitare bari, na fama nɛ tɔɔrɔde.
Bɔɲɛ sɛɛwaxi, seri fanyi na a ra,
Mixi ɲaaxi see rasuxuma gundo ra,
Lɔnni makɔrɛ xaxilima ra,
Di xaxilitare findima tɔɔrɛ nan na a baba bɛ,
A mu lan kɔbiri xa ba tinxintɔɛ yi ra,
Xaxilima a dɛ nan suxuma, a bɔɲɛ mu tema.
Xaxilitare nɔma a maɲɔxunde lɔnnila ra xa a dunduxi,
